result.prevName: Shanghai LongYun Media Group Co., Ltd.
result.longName: Shanghai LongYun Cultural Creation & Technology Group Co., Ltd.

assetProfile.address2: 16th Floor No. 118 Minsheng Road Pudong New Area
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Shanghai LongYun Cultural Creation & Technology Group Co., Ltd. provides advertising services in China. The company offers market research, brand management, creative design, video production, integrated marketing strategy, advertising strategy, content creative shooting and production, information flow purchase, online and offline activities, advertising placement, advertising post-buy evaluation, and other full-case services. It is also involved in the production and distribution of film and television dramas, various shows, short videos, etc.; video script creativity, video shooting and editing, account operation, live broadcast, freight forwarding operation, live broadcast celebrity incubation, and other activities; and big data operations. The company was formerly known as Shanghai LongYun Advertising & Media Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shanghai LongYun Media Group Co., Ltd. in February 2019. Shanghai LongYun Cultural Creation & Technology Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Yanwei  Zhou
companyOfficers.title: CFO & Sec. of the Board of Directors
